translations.key: Every personal information, as your email, will be exclusively used to contact you back directly and to address your needs in the best way possible

value.en-US: Every personal information, as your email, will be exclusively used to contact you back directly and to address your needs in the best way possible
value.it-IT: Tutte le informazioni personali, come l'indirizzo email, verranno utilizzate esclusivamente per ricontattarti e per venire incontro ai tuoi bisogni nel miglior modo possibile
value.fr-FR: Toutes les informations personnelles, telles que votre adresse e-mail, seront utilisées exclusivement pour vous contacter et répondre au mieux à vos besoins.

translations.key: We do not store any kind of data

value.en-US: We do not store any kind of data
value.it-IT: Noi non immagazziniamo alcun tipo di dato
L'email è stata inviata con successo
value.fr-FR: L'e-mail a été envoyé avec succès

translations.key: Ouch, we could not send your email

value.en-US: Ouch, we could not send your email
value.it-IT: Ahi, non siamo riusciti a inviare la tua email
value.fr-FR: Ouch, nous n'avons pas pu envoyer votre email

translations.key: Please, retry or write us at

value.en-US: Please, retry or write us at
value.it-IT: Per favore, riprova o scrivici a

translations.key: Let us know about this issue too

value.en-US: Let us know about this issue too
value.fr-FR: Faites-nous également part de ce problème
Nous nous excusons pour la gêne occasionnée
Voir les étapes sur la carte

translations.key: Airport pick-ups (Rome); drop off at the airport/city in Pisa or Florence

value.en-US: Airport pick-ups (Rome); drop off at the airport/city in Pisa or Florence
value.it-IT: Recupero dagli aeroporti (Roma); Accompagnamento all'aeroporto/città di Pisa o Firenze
value.fr-FR: Récupération dans les aéroports (Rome); Accompagnement à l’aéroport/ville de Pise ou Florence

translations.key: Bike rental (any kind: gravel, MTB, e-bike, vintage)

value.en-US: Bike rental (any kind: gravel, MTB, e-bike, vintage)
value.it-IT: Noleggio bici (qualsiasi tipo: gravel, MTB, e-bike, vintage)
value.fr-FR: Location de vélos (tout type: gravier, VTT, e-bike, vintage)

translations.key: Hotel (single room or double/+ for couples/families) 7 nights

value.en-US: Hotel (single room or double/+ for couples/families) 7 nights
value.it-IT: Hotel (camera singola o doppia/+ per coppie/famiglie) 7 notti
value.fr-FR: Hôtel (chambre simple ou double/+ pour couples/familles) 7 nuits

translations.key: Visit to towns / vineries / agriturismo / bread making / cheese making (depending on availability and group preferences)

value.en-US: Visit to towns / vineries / agriturismo / bread making / cheese making (depending on availability and group preferences)
value.it-IT: Visita a città / cantine / agriturismi / panifici / caseifici (a seconda della disponibilità e delle preferenze del gruppo)
value.fr-FR: Visite de villes / vignobles / agritourisme / fabrication de pain / fabrication de fromage (selon la disponibilité et les préférences du groupe)

translations.key: We are a composite team of friends, with completely different backgrounds and from several countries. But we all love cycling, especially in Italy, appreciating its tasty composite and vast culture and its food.

value.en-US: We are a composite team of friends, with completely different backgrounds and from several countries. But we all love cycling, especially in Italy, appreciating its composite and vast culture and its tasty food.
value.it-IT: Siamo una squadra di amici, provenienti da contesti completamente differenti e da diversi paesi. Ma tutti noi amiamo il ciclismo e stare in sella alle nostre bici, specialmente in Italia, apprezzando la sua cultura diversificata e vasta e il suo buon cibo.
value.fr-FR: Nous sommes des amis, de pays différents et avec expériences de vie complètement différents. Mais nous aimons tous pédaler, surtout en Italie, en appréciant sa culture diversifiée et vaste et sa bonne nourriture.

translations.key: The idea of creating a unique bike tour to give our guests an unforgettable experience with us has been in the air for years now, but between Covid, travel restrictions, and organisational requirements it took a bit longer than originally hoped.

value.en-US: The idea of creating a unique bike tour to give our guests an unforgettable experience with us has been in the air for years now, but between Covid, travel restrictions, and organisational requirements it took a bit longer than originally hoped.
value.it-IT: L'idea di creare un tour in bici unico per regalare ai nostri ospiti un'esperienza indimenticabile da vivere insieme era nell'aria ormai da anni. Ma, per doversi motivi - Covid, restrizioni di viaggio ed esigenze organizzative -, ci è voluto un po' più di quanto inizialmente sperato.
value.fr-FR: L'idée de créer un tour à vélo unique pour offrir à nos clients une expérience inoubliable avec nous était dans l'air depuis des années maintenant. Mais, pour diverses raisons - Covid, restrictions de voyage et besoins d'organisation -, cela a pris un peu plus de temps qu'espéré initialement.

translations.key: At long last it can now come to reality!

value.en-US: At long last it can now come to reality!

translations.key: We strongly believe that our different experiences in work and life will be our biggest strength and will allow us to offer you the best trip you’ve ever had!

value.en-US: We strongly believe that our different experiences in work and life will be our biggest strength and will allow us to offer you the best trip you’ve ever had!
value.it-IT: Siamo convinti che le nostre diverse esperienze, nel lavoro e nella vita, possano essere il nostro asso nella manica nell'offrirti il miglior viaggio che tu abbia mai fatto!
value.fr-FR: Nous sommes convaincus que nos différentes expériences, dans le travail et dans la vie, peuvent être notre atout pour vous offrir le meilleur voyage que vous ayez jamais eu!

translations.key: Argiro is a professional cyclist from Greece.

value.en-US: Argiro is a professional cyclist from Greece.
value.it-IT: Argiro è una ciclista professionista proveniente dalla Grecia.
value.fr-FR: Argiro est une cycliste professionnelle grecque.

translations.key: She raced all over the world for international teams, competing for a long time in paracycling as a tandem pilot, winning a World Cup and participating in the London 2012 and Rio 2016 Olympics. She then switched to track (individual cycling) after Tokio 2020.

value.en-US: She raced all over the world for international teams, competing for a long time in paracycling as a tandem pilot, winning a World Cup and participating in the London 2012 and Rio 2016 Olympics. She then switched to track (individual cycling) after Tokio 2020.
value.it-IT: Ha corso per team internazionali per tutto il mondo, gareggiando un lungo periodo nel paraciclismo come pilota di tandem, vincendo una coppa del mondo e partecipando alle Olimpiaci di Londra 2012 e di Rio 2016. Dopo Tokyo 2020 si è specializzata sul ciclismo individuale su pista.
value.fr-FR: Elle a couru partout dans le monde pour des équipes internationales, participant pendant longtemps au paracyclisme en tant que pilote de tandem, en gagnant une Coupe du monde et participant aux Jeux olympiques de Londres 2012 et Rio 2016. Elle est ensuite passée à la piste (cyclisme individuel) après Tokio 2020.

translations.key: This year she'll team with Valentina in the Denver Disruptors Team, hailing from Colorado, racing track and crits.

value.en-US: This year she'll team with Valentina in the Denver Disruptors Team, hailing from Colorado, racing track and crits.
value.it-IT: Quest'anno gareggerà insieme a Valentina su pista e nei criterium nel team Denver Disruptors del Colorado (USA).
value.fr-FR: Cette année, elle sera la coéquipière de Valentina sur la piste et dans les critériums dans l’équipe Denver Disruptors du Colorado (USA).

translations.key: Roberto Lencioni (“Carube”) is an all round cycling legend. He was Cipollini’s personal and most trusted mechanic.

value.en-US: Roberto Lencioni (“Carube”) is an all round cycling legend. He was Cipollini’s personal and most trusted mechanic.
value.it-IT: Roberto Lencioni (“Carube”) è stato una leggenda ciclistica a tutto tondo. Era il meccanico personale di Cipollini, nonchè il più fidato.
value.fr-FR: Roberto Lencioni (“Carube”) était une légende du cyclisme. Il était le mécanicien personnel de Cipollini, ainsi que le plus fiable.

translations.key: A talented racer in his younger years, he then went on to become a mechanic in the biggest teams of the time – such as Saeco, Domina Vacanze, Naturino, Del Tongo, Jolly Club 88, Universal Caffè, Gis, San Giacomo, Selle San Marco, Alfa Lum, Magniflex, Alba Cucine, Dromedario.

value.en-US: A talented racer in his younger years, he then went on to become a mechanic in the biggest teams of the time – such as Saeco, Domina Vacanze, Naturino, Del Tongo, Jolly Club 88, Universal Caffè, Gis, San Giacomo, Selle San Marco, Alfa Lum, Magniflex, Alba Cucine, Dromedario.
value.it-IT: Talento sulle due ruote in gioventù, è poi diventato meccanico nelle principali squadre del periodo - Saeco, Domina Vacanze, Naturino, Del Tongo, Jolly Club 88, Universal Caffè, Gis, San Giacomo, Selle San Marco, Alfa Lum, Magniflex, Alba Cucine, Dromedario.
value.fr-FR: Talent sur deux roues dans sa jeunesse, il est devenu ensuite mécanicien dans les principales équipes de l’époque - Saeco, Domina Vacanze, Naturino, Del Tongo, Jolly Club 88, Universal Caffè, Gis, San Giacomo, Selle San Marco, Alfa Lum, Magniflex, Alba Cucine, Dromedario.

translations.key: He also directed a professional women’s team, winning the Giro d’Italia with Michela Fanini, and also served as a team manager for the National Team of Argentina.

value.en-US: He also directed a professional women’s team, winning the Giro d’Italia with Michela Fanini, and also served as a team manager for the National Team of Argentina.
value.it-IT: Ha guidato una squadra femminile, la Michela Fanini, vincendo il Giro d'Italia. Ha anche ricoperto il ruolo di team manager per la nazionale Argentina.
value.fr-FR: Il a dirigé une équipe féminine, Michela Fanini, en gagnant le Giro d’Italia. Encore, il a été manager de l’équipe nationale d’Argentine.

translations.key: He now collaborates with L’Eroica, provides services to bike tours, works for Vittoria Servizio Corse in competitive cycling events.

value.en-US: He now collaborates with L’Eroica, provides services to bike tours, works for Vittoria Servizio Corse in competitive cycling events.
value.it-IT: Ora collabora con L'Eroica, fornisce servizi per tour in bicicletta e lavora per  Vittoria Servizio Corse in manifestazioni ciclistiche di alto livello.
value.fr-FR: Aujourd’hui, il coopère avec L’Eroica, il fournit des services aux tours à vélo et travaille pour Vittoria Servizio Corse dans des événements cyclistes de haut niveau.

translations.key: He can tell stories for days, it’s just a pleasure – and an incredible honour – to have him with us.

value.en-US: He can tell stories for days, it’s just a pleasure – and an incredible honour – to have him with us.
value.it-IT: Può raccontare storie per giorni ed è una gioia enorme - nonchè un grande onore - averlo con noi.
value.fr-FR: Il peut raconter des histoires pendant plusieurs jours et c’est une immense joie - ainsi qu’un grand honneur - de l’avoir avec nous.

translations.key: Luis is an inhabitant of the world proudly born in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain.

value.en-US: Luis is an inhabitant of the world proudly born in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain.
value.it-IT: Louis è un cittadino del mondo orgogliosamente originario di Barcellona, Catalogna, Spagna.
value.fr-FR: Louis est un citoyen du monde fièrement originaire de Barcelone, Catalogne, Espagne.

translations.key: He’s an adventurer and a dreamer, driven by curiosity and a continuous search for challenge. His life path brought him so far from the European aerospace industry, to launching rockets into space in the French Guiana, to a pro cycling career as a skilled race mechanic for top level organizations such as Team Sunweb, USA Cycling or Trek Segafedo.

value.en-US: He’s an adventurer and a dreamer, driven by curiosity and a continuous search for challenge. His life path brought him so far from the European aerospace industry, to launching rockets into space in the French Guiana, to a pro cycling career as a skilled race mechanic for top level organizations such as Team Sunweb, USA Cycling or Trek Segafedo.
value.it-IT: È un avventuriero e un sognatore, spinto dalla curiosità e alla continua ricerca di nuove sfide. Il suo percorso di vita l'ha portato dal mondo aerospaziale europeo, a lanciare razzi nello spazio nella Guyana francese, fino a una carriera ciclistica come meccanico altamente qualificato per squadre di prim'ordine come Team Sunweb, USA Cycling or Trek Segafedo.
value.fr-FR: C’est un aventurier et un rêveur, animé par la curiosité et constamment à la recherche de nouveaux défis. Son parcours de vie l’a conduit du monde aérospatial européen, lançant des fusées dans l’espace en Guyane Français, à une carrière cycliste en tant que mécanicien hautement qualifié pour des équipes de premier plan telles que Team Sunweb, USA Cycling ou Trek Segafedo.

translations.key: And the best is always still to come.

value.en-US: And the best is always still to come.
value.it-IT: E il meglio deve sempre ancora venire.
value.fr-FR: Et le meilleur est toujours à venir.

translations.key: Lucia is a project manager from Verona, Italy.

value.en-US: Lucia is a project manager from Verona, Italy.
value.it-IT: Lucia è una project manager proveniente da Verona, Italia.
value.fr-FR: Lucia est une chef de projet de Vérone, en Italie.

translations.key: A former high level soccer player, she started riding a few years ago, and got the bug for it.

value.en-US: A former high level soccer player, she started riding a few years ago, and got the bug for it.
value.it-IT: Ex calciatrice di alto livello, ha iniziato ad andare in bici alcuni anni fa e se ne è appassionata.
value.fr-FR: Ancienne footballeuse de haut niveau, elle a commencé le cyclisme il y a quelques années et s’en est passionnée.

translations.key: Once she gets out of the office she can be a bartender, a hostess during events, a scoutmaster for kids, she just loves spending time with people.

value.en-US: Once she gets out of the office she can be a bartender, a hostess during events, a scoutmaster for kids, she just loves spending time with people.
value.it-IT: Fuori dall'ufficio può vestire i panni di bartender, hostess per eventi, capo-scout per bambini e molto altro. Ama trascorrere il suo tempo in mezzo alle persone.
value.fr-FR: En dehors du bureau, vous pouvez jouer le rôle de barman, d’hôtesse d’événement, de chef scout pour enfants et bien plus encore. Elle aime passer son temps parmi les gens.

translations.key: Charismatic and energetic, she embraced this project with joy and commitment.

value.en-US: Charismatic and energetic, she embraced this project with joy and commitment.
value.it-IT: Carismatica ed energica, ha abbracciato questo progetto con gioia e profondo impegno.
value.fr-FR: Charismatique et énergique, elle a embrassé ce projet avec joie et un profond engagement.
